name: Once Upon An Island
description:
• Genre: Third person adventure game

• Target Audience: Age 10+

• Look and Feel: Low poly, cartoonish and colourful

• Target Platform and Game Engine: Developed in Unity 3D for Windows PC

This is the story of a small monkey that lives on an island.

One day, when he woke up, his island was not on the water, where it

belongs.

For some reason, his home was up in the sky and his family nowhere

to be seen.

Help him finding out what happened to his family as you go through

different puzzles on floating islands.

Follow the coconuts, that’s a trail left by his family, it might help you!
